title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 600.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 600.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

The Department of Transportation, in cooperation with the

State Police and other authorized law enforcement agencies, shall implement an
emissions inspection component to accompany the statewide Diesel Emissions

Inspection and Maintenance Program of heavy duty diesel vehicles in accordance
with the provisions of section
14
of the

Transportation Law, section
19-0320
of the Environmental

Conservation Law, section
301
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law, and 6 NYCRR Subpart
217-5. This emissions
inspection component shall be implemented in accordance with the dates
specified in 6 NYCRR section 217- 5.2(c) and shall utilize the heavy duty
diesel emissions standards contained in 6 NYCRR section
217-5.3. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
600.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
